headline: Assurant to Announce Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: ATLANTA, July 08, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, will release second quarter 2025 financial results on Tuesday, August 5, 2025, after the market closes. The news release will be available on Assurant's website at www.assurant.com. In conjunction with the news release, Assurant will host a conference call the following morning, Wednesday, Aug

headline: Assurant Enters Strategic Partnership with Plug® to Fuel Growth In Certified Devices and Expand Capabilities in the Secondary Market
summary: ATLANTA, July 08, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, today announced a strategic partnership with St. Louis-based Plug®, a fast-growing direct-to-consumer (D2C) commerce platform delivering certified pre-owned (CPO) smartphones, tablets, computers, and accessories to consumers nationwide.

content.title: Assurant Enters Strategic Partnership with Plug® to Fuel Growth In Certified Devices and Expand Capabilities in the Secondary Market
content.summary: ATLANTA, July 08, 2025--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, today announced a strategic partnership with St. Louis-based Plug®, a fast-growing direct-to-consumer (D2C) commerce platform delivering certified pre-owned (CPO) smartphones, tablets, computers, and accessories to consumers nationwide.
